resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104794</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104794</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206030</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Ask an Astronomer for Kids</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bitten Sie einen Astronomen um Zicklein</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Demandez à un astronome des gosses</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Peça a um astrónomo miúdos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">_ chied un astronomo per capretto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ρωτήστε έναν αστρονόμο για τα κατσίκια</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Pida a astrónomo cabritos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">provides answers and photos for 200 common questions about astronomy and objects in space. Topics include planets, stars, the solar system, comets, asteroids, galaxies, and the night sky.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">stellt Antworten und Fotos für 200 geläufige 
Fragen über Astronomie und Nachrichten im Platz zur Verfügung. 
Themen enthalten Planeten, Sterne, das Solarsystem, die Kometen,
die Planetoide, die Galaxien und den Nachthimmel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">fournit des réponses et des photos pour 200 
questions communes au sujet d'astronomie et des objets dans l'espace. 
Les sujets incluent des planètes, tiennent le premier rôle, le système
solaire, des comètes, des asteroïdes, des galaxies, et le ciel de 
nuit.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fornece respostas e fotos para 200 perguntas 
comuns sobre a astronomia e objetos no espaço. Os tópicos 
incluem planetas, estrelas, o sistema solar, cometas, asteroids, 
galáxias, e o céu da noite.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fornisce le risposte e le foto per 200 domande 
comuni circa astronomia e gli oggetti nello spazio. I soggetti 
includono i pianeti, le stelle, il sistema solare, le comete, gli 
asteroidi, le galassie ed il cielo di notte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δίνει τις απαντήσεις και τις φωτογραφίες για 200 
κοινές ερωτήσεις για την αστρονομία και αντιτίθεται στο διάστημα.
Τα θέματα περιλαμβάνουν τους πλανήτες, τα αστέρια, το 
ηλιακό σύστημα, τους κομήτες, asteroids, τους γαλαξίες, και τον
ουρανό νύχτας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">proporciona a respuestas y a las fotos para 200 
preguntas comunes sobre astronomía y a los objetos en espacio. 
Los asuntos incluyen los planetas, las estrellas, la Sistema 
Solar, los cometas, los asteroides, las galaxias, y el cielo de la 
noche.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206030</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104794</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/ask-an-astronomer-for-kids</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
